Submitted on Wednesday, 2013-13-03            <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuKylin/1304-beta-1-ReleaseNote-zh|中文版]]</nowiki>
== Summary ==
  Beta 1 of our 13.04 development version is available for download and testing. 

== Getting UbuntuKylin 13.04 Beta 1 ==
  This has finally landed:
     <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/ubuntukylin/releases/raring/beta-1 | Download UbuntuKylin-13.04-Beta1]]</nowiki>

== UbuntuKylin Features ==
  It comes with UbuntuKylin themes, and features:
* unity-china-music-scope
   Easier and more convenient music search, help you find latest, hottest Chinese pop songs.
   <nowiki>[[File:music.jpg]]</nowiki>

* indicator-china-weather
   Weather forecast information in detail, provide effective references for your daily life and travel.
   <nowiki>[[File:weather.jpg]]</nowiki>

* chinese-calendar
   Easy to use, authoritative Chinese calendar, contains the traditional lunar calendar and the Gregorian 
   calendar, facilitate inquiries of public holidays, familiar to Chinese citizens.
   <nowiki>[[File:calendar.jpg]]</nowiki>

* fcitx
   Fcitx is used as the default input method, support cloud Pinyin input, more intelligent association.
   <nowiki>[[File:inputmethod.jpg]]</nowiki>

Take a look at the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/community/conduct|Ubuntu Code of Conduct]]</nowiki>, try UbuntuKylin 13.04 Beta 1 and head on over to the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuKylin/1304-beta-1Feedback|Feedback Page]]</nowiki>. Your input is an invaluable resource, so do take the time to write down your thoughts and let us know what you think!
